page.title: 13Survey of Family Life
page.content: reading,knitting,gardening,walking and concerts.The 31-60 age listened to the radio more than any other age group & the 60+ watched most TV.Chidren & 31- 60 age watched TV for 14hrs each week. MY FAMILY-SUNDAY:I watch my dad play a rugby match.Sometimes I am the lucky mascot.We may go for a picnic where we play football & cricket.In the evening I watch the A Team,then have a bath & supper.I pack my school bag and go to bed.A SCHOOL DAY:My sister wakes me at 7am.I get up and have Weetabix cereals for breakfast.I meet my friend at 8.30 and we walk to school.I like Thursdays best because we have football rounders At school we make things like teepees & paper Indians.I have a packed lunch, but some children have a school dinner One day a week we go swimming.School ends at 3.30pm.When I get home I play in the garden.I go to bed at 8.30pm.
